sentences.sentence: Tom buried his head among his pillows, murmuring plaintively, "Alack, it was no dream!"
sentences.translation: 汤姆把头埋在枕头里，伤心地低声说：“咳，这不是梦！”

sentences.sentence: Birds cry plaintively before they die, men speak kindly in the presence of death.
sentences.translation: 鸟之将死，其鸣也哀；人之将死，其言也善。

sentences.sentence: "Why? What did I do wrong?" he asks plaintively.
sentences.translation: “为什么？是因为我过去做错了什么吗？”他忧伤地问道。
